item.title: my blog writeup
item.description: Challenge description check out my blog ! files (source code): src_086b774e10373abf7d2fcc1c7dbcb23f9caf768f8fbcc3492e372cdcb87193c4.zip . ├── Dockerfile ├── app.py ├── requirements.txt └── templates ├── add.html ├── admin.html ├── index.html └── post.html sha256 sums: 086b774e10373abf7d2fcc1c7dbcb23f9caf768f8fbcc3492e372cdcb87193c4 src_086b774e10373abf7d2fcc1c7dbcb23f9caf768f8fbcc3492e372cdcb87193c4.zip 17 participants solved this challenge out of 86 → 19.77% solve rate It was the 9th hardest challenge out of 25 challenges in the CTF Disclaimer: challange was using tourist tourist github - CTFd plugin for visiting websites, which was hosted during the CTF (but now it is not available)

item.title: safebox writeup
item.description: Challenge description Your files. Encrypted at rest. Premium accounts available soon. // careful, this app is resetting every 15 mintutes source code: safebox Solution we are presented with a site that allows us to register and upload files that will be encrypted (also we can’t download them directly by pressing button as it is for ‘premium’ users only). files are stored with per-user folders and ecrypted with AES-256-OFB mode. flag is stored in admin’s directory
